name: The Reaver and The Glistener
description:
Landrai the Reaver gets bored with sitting around waiting for the adventure to come to them. So, they leave to find a way out with their friend/lover/cellmate at their side.

Made for Text-Only Jam 2019 hosted by 8 Bits to Infinity. The theme was Dragons and Dungeons.

CONTROLS:

  • Move - WASD or Arrow keys
  • Talk/Shoot fireball - Spacebar
  • ESC - Quit game
  • Mouse - Clicking on menus

Made with Unity 2019.2 using Fungus for dialog and various interactions.
